name: The PENNSYLVANIA STATE SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION and Indiana University of Pennsylvania, Appellants v. INDIANA AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT; County of Indiana; and Indiana County Board of Assessment Appeals, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania State System of Higher Education v. Indiana Area School District

parties: The PENNSYLVANIA STATE SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION and Indiana University of Pennsylvania, Appellants v. INDIANA AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT; County of Indiana; and Indiana County Board of Assessment Appeals, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of June, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
69 A.3d 236
The PENNSYLVANIA STATE SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION and Indiana University of Pennsylvania, Appellants v. INDIANA AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT; County of Indiana; and Indiana County Board of Assessment Appeals, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 18, 2013.
